data.name: Gran Premio
data.detailed_description:
About Gran Premio

Gran Premio is a fast paced online multiplayer car racing game. Race with friends and strangers alike throughout the world's most beautiful cities and regions. Drive fast luxury cars, get in police chases, and be the first to the finish line for the biggest slice of the reward pie! Are you ready to whiten your knuckles and risk it all?

Dedication to Free-to-Play

Gran Premio is and always will be a free to play game. Feel free to purchase the donation DLC if you feel like supporting the project.

data.short_description: A fast paced online multiplayer car racing game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04, or CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (such as Kernel or Compositor) Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
